A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a star wars fan since a little kid. I remember camping out for the prequels and going to midnight showings. I was sickened  and depressed after seeing this flop. The political and feministic overtones made me want to vomit. The lack of a coherent plot and with so many details being overlooked compels me to leave a review. Management and director ruined this franchise. I'm a Millienial and not an old school generation 1 fan. Yet I had to leave a review about how ruined this film made me feel about future Star Wars movie endeavors.
